title: Sift or Get Off the PoC: Applying Information Retrieval to Vulnerability Research with SiftRank
summary: Security research is fundamentally a problem of resource constraint and consequent prioritization. There is simply too much attack surface and too little time and energy to spend analyzing it all. The most effective security researchers are often those who are most skilled at intuitively deciding which part of an expansive attack surface to investigate.
